table_description: Azure App Service Web App Slot

columns.name: name
columns.description: Resource Name.

columns.name: app_name
columns.description: The name of the application.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Resource ID of the app slot.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: Contains the kind of the resource.

columns.name: state
columns.description: Current state of the app.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Resource type.

columns.name: last_modified_time_utc
columns.description: Last time the app was modified, in UTC.

columns.name: repository_site_name
columns.description: Name of the repository site.

columns.name: usage_state
columns.description: State indicating whether the app has exceeded its quota usage. Read-only. Possible values include: 'UsageStateNormal', 'UsageStateExceeded'.

columns.name: enabled
columns.description: Indicates wheather the app is enabled.

columns.name: availability_state
columns.description: Management information availability state for the app. Possible values include: 'Normal', 'Limited', 'DisasterRecoveryMode'.

columns.name: server_farm_id
columns.description: Resource ID of the associated App Service plan, formatted as: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionID}/resourceGroups/{groupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/serverfarms/{appServicePlanName}'.

columns.name: reserved
columns.description: True if reserved; otherwise, false.

columns.name: is_xenon
columns.description: Obsolete: Hyper-V sandbox.

columns.name: hyper_v
columns.description: Hyper-V sandbox.

columns.name: scm_site_also_stopped
columns.description: True to stop SCM (KUDU) site when the app is stopped; otherwise, false. The default is false.

columns.name: target_swap_slot
columns.description: Specifies which deployment slot this app will swap into.

columns.name: client_affinity_enabled
columns.description: True to enable client affinity; false to stop sending session affinity cookies, which route client requests in the same session to the same instance. Default is true.

columns.name: client_cert_mode
columns.description: This composes with ClientCertEnabled setting. ClientCertEnabled: false means ClientCert is ignored. ClientCertEnabled: true and ClientCertMode: Required means ClientCert is required.ClientCertEnabled: true and ClientCertMode: Optional means ClientCert is optional or accepted. Possible values include: 'Required', 'Optional'.

columns.name: client_cert_exclusion_paths
columns.description: Client certificate authentication comma-separated exclusion paths.

columns.name: host_names_disabled
columns.description: True to disable the public hostnames of the app; otherwise, false. If true, the app is only accessible via API management process.

columns.name: custom_domain_verification_id
columns.description: Unique identifier that verifies the custom domains assigned to the app. The customer will add this ID to a text record for verification.

columns.name: outbound_ip_addresses
columns.description: List of IP addresses that the app uses for outbound connections (e.g. database access). Includes VIPs from tenants that site can be hosted with current settings.

columns.name: possible_outbound_ip_addresses
columns.description: List of IP addresses that the app uses for outbound connections (e.g. database access). Includes VIPs from all tenants except dataComponent.

columns.name: container_size
columns.description: Size of the function container.

columns.name: suspended_till
columns.description: App suspended till in case memory-time quota is exceeded.

columns.name: is_default_container
columns.description: True if the app is a default container; otherwise, false.

columns.name: default_host_name
columns.description: Default hostname of the app.

columns.name: https_only
columns.description: Configures a web site to accept only https requests.

columns.name: redundancy_mode
columns.description: Site redundancy mode. Possible values include: 'RedundancyModeNone', 'RedundancyModeManual', 'RedundancyModeFailover', 'RedundancyModeActiveActive', 'RedundancyModeGeoRedundant'.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Managed service identity.

columns.name: host_names
columns.description: Hostnames associated with the app.

columns.name: enabled_host_names
columns.description: Enabled hostnames for the app. Hostnames need to be assigned (see HostNames) AND enabled. Otherwise, the app is not served on those hostnames.

columns.name: host_name_ssl_states
columns.description: Hostname SSL states are used to manage the SSL bindings for app's hostnames.

columns.name: site_config
columns.description: Configuration of the app.

columns.name: traffic_manager_host_names
columns.description: Azure Traffic Manager hostnames associated with the app.

columns.name: hosting_environment_profile
columns.description: App Service Environment to use for the app.

columns.name: slot_swap_status
columns.description: Status of the last deployment slot swap operation.

columns.name: site_config_resource
columns.description: Configuration of an app, such as platform version and bitness, default documents, virtual applications, Always On, etc.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
